context: Tests whether the agent correctly identifies when NOT to use BDD, distinguishes between stakeholder-facing behavior vs internal implementation details, and applies appropriate scope boundaries for BDD feature files.

checklist.name: Identifies internal implementation exclusions
checklist.description: Correctly identifies that low-level unit behavior (validation functions, algorithms, utilities) should NOT use BDD

checklist.name: Stakeholder-facing behavior identification
checklist.description: Correctly identifies user-visible behaviors that ARE appropriate for BDD (registration, checkout, search)

checklist.name: Clear scope boundaries
checklist.description: Provides clear guidelines distinguishing BDD-appropriate vs inappropriate scenarios

checklist.name: Alternative testing recommendations
checklist.description: Suggests appropriate testing approaches for scenarios that shouldn't use BDD (unit tests, integration tests)

checklist.name: Business readability principle
checklist.description: Uses business readability as a key criterion for BDD scope decisions

checklist.name: Implementation detail avoidance
checklist.description: Explicitly excludes internal system details, algorithms, and technical components from BDD scope
